thread.title: India Coast Guard Recruitment 2025 Notification OUT - Check ICG Yantrik / Navik GD Vacancy Details, Age Limit and More
thread.title_full: India Coast Guard Recruitment 2025 Notification OUT - Check ICG Yantrik / Navik GD Vacancy Details, Age Limit and More

author: Manish Kumar
title: India Coast Guard Recruitment 2025 Notification OUT - Check ICG Yantrik / Navik GD Vacancy Details, Age Limit and More
text:
Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2025: Indian Coast Guard has published a short notification for recruitment to the post of Navik (General Duty), Navik (Domestic Branch) & Yantriks in the Indian Coast Guard, an Armed Force of the Union. These positions are available under Coast Guard enrolled Personnel Test (CGEPT) against 01/2026 & 02/2026.
The candidates are required to submit their application through online mode from 11th June to 25th June 2025 at indiancoastguard.gov.in.
Candidates can check eligibility, selection process, age limit, application process, and others at indiancoastguard.gov.in.
Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2025 Important Dates
The online application process in underway and candidates can apply for these posts after following the schedule given below-
Event | Details |
Opening date for online application | 11th June , 2025 |
Closing date for online application | 25th June , 2025 |
India Coast Guard Recruitment 2025 Notification PDF
Indian Coast Guard 2025 Selection Process
Selection of candidates will be done on the basis of performance of candidates in various rounds followed by medical standards during medical examination and the number of vacancies available for the post in respective batches. The recruitment process will be based on Computer Based Online Examination/Document verification/Assessment Test/ Medical Examination and others.
Indian Coast Guard 2025 Educational Qualification
Candidates should have the posts wise requisite educational qualification as given below-
Posts | Educational Qualification |
Navik (General Duty) | Class 12th passed with Maths and Physics from an education board recognized by Council of Boards for School Education (COBSE). |
Navik (Domestic Branch). | Class 10th passed from an education board recognized by Council of Boards for School Education (COBSE). |
Yantrik | Class 10th passed from an education board recognized by Council of Boards for School Education (COBSE) and Diploma in Electrical/ Mechanical / Electronics/ Telecommunication (Radio/Power) Engineering of duration 03 or 04 years approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). |
OR Class 10th & Class 12th passed from an education board recognized by Council of Boards for School Education (COBSE) “AND” Diploma in Electrical/ Mechanical / Electronics/ Telecommunication (Radio/Power) Engineering of duration 02 or 03 years approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). |
Indian Coast Guard Vacancy 2025
A total of 520 posts are to be filled through the recruitment drive including Navik (General Duty) for batches 01/2026 and 02/2026. You can check the details of the Navik (General Duty) vacancy given below-
CGEPT-01/26 batch
Post | Total |
Navik (General Duty) | 260 |
CGEPT-02/26 batch
Post | Total |
Navik (General Duty) | 260 |
Indian Coast Guard Vacancy 2025 for Yantrik (Mechanical, Electrical & Electronics)
Post | Total |
Yantrik (Mechanical) | 30 |
Yantrik (Electrical) | 11 |
Yantrik (Electronics) | 19 |
Examination Fee
Candidates are required to pay a fee of Rs. 300/- through online mode by using net banking or by using
Visa/ Master/ Maestro/ Rupay Credit/ Debit Card/ UPI. Candidates for SC/ ST category are exempted from payment of fee.
How to Apply for Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2025?
Eligible and interested candidate can apply for these posts in online mode at the official website- https://joinindiancoastguard.cdac.in/cgept. Check the notification link for details of the application process.
